name: Marry Me Salmon
description: Prepare to fall hook, line, and sinker for this fish version of the beloved viral “Marry Me Chicken” recipe that took over social media! It's creamy and indulgent, with bursts of tomato goodness and hints of basil in every bite. Elevate your weeknights with this easy yet impressive dish. Who knows, you might just reel in a ring!
preparation: In a bowl, whisk together seasoning, cream, and water. Set aside.
Heat oil in Sauté Pan over medium-high heat. Add salmon; sear 2–3 min per side or until golden.
Stir in reserved seasoning mixture. Reduce heat to medium-low. Cover and simmer 5 min, stirring occasionally. Add spinach; cover and cook until wilted.
Serve over pasta, rice, or mashed potatoes, if desired.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup veggies and 1 cup rice or pasta.

products.name: Marry Me Chicken Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: While we can’t guarantee a marriage proposal following this meal, we are certain Marry Me Chicken is going to be a big part of your life! This one-pan meal is creamy and decadent, with bursts of tomato flavour and notes of basil in every bite. It’s perfect for special occasions, holiday feasts, or weeknight dinners when you want to feel a little fancy without spending hours in the kitchen—in fact it’s ready in 15 minutes!

products.name: Sauté Pan
summary: An all-purpose pan to brown, sauté, and simmer—ideal for one pan meals.
